personal_information.name: Ayush Kaithwas
personal_information.role: Automation Engineer | Embedded Systems & Robotics Developer

professional_experience.title: Automation Engineer
highlights: Developed complete control software for high-precision Peristaltic Pump and Automatic Pipetting Station using STM32, FreeRTOS, HAL drivers, and TouchGFX.
Improved fluid dispensing accuracy from ±10% to ±0.5%, achieving industry-grade repeatability.
Designed responsive TouchGFX UI with custom widgets for enhanced operator usability.
Implemented safety checks, fault handling, and stable inter-task communication to improve system reliability.
Worked extensively on embedded firmware, motion control, and hardware–software co-design.

professional_experience.title: Robotics Programmer & Mentor
highlights: Led programming for multiple FTC robots using Java, contributing to wins at FTC Regionals 2024 and Asia Pacific Open Championship 2024 (Australia).
Mentored NGO teams under resource constraints, teaching control systems, inverse kinematics, and automation logic.
Conducted Java programming workshops with strong participant feedback.
Worked on advanced robotic prototypes including quadruped robots, robotic arms, Mars rover prototypes, and assistive robots.

professional_experience.title: Embedded Developer
highlights: Implemented ESP-NOW, BLE, Firebase, and WiFi Mesh for connected IoT systems.
Built end-to-end IoT solutions integrating embedded firmware with web dashboards.
Worked on real-time sensor data acquisition and embedded control logic.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (Electronics and Communication Engineering)
education.institution: Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology

projects.name: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection using CNN
highlights: Designed an end-to-end ML pipeline using TensorFlow, Python, and OpenCV.
Achieved 92.3% classification accuracy on retinal image datasets.
Integrated results with NodeMCU, 128x64 LCD, and Firebase for real-time monitoring.

projects.name: Global Home Automation System
highlights: Developed a web-controlled home automation platform accessible globally.
Integrated temperature, humidity, and appliance status monitoring.
Combined embedded systems with web technologies.

projects.name: Omnific Cars
highlights: Built a full-stack car listing platform with dynamic data loading.
Implemented CRUD operations with MongoDB backend.

achievements: Winner – FTC India Regionals 2025 (Mentor, Team Matrix) – Qualified for World Championship, Houston.
Winner – Asia Pacific Open Championship 2024, Australia (Mentor, Team Paraducks).
